name: White Smoke
short-desc: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokemon.
long-desc: This Pokemon cannot have its stats lowered by other Pokemon.  This ability does not prevent any stat losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Speed cut from paralysis; nor self-inflicted stat drops, such as the Special Attack drop from ; nor opponent-triggered stat boosts, such as the Attack boost from .  This Pokemon can still be passed negative stat modifiers through , , or .  This ability functions identically to  in battle.  Overworld: If the lead Pokemon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
